member.name: T:portal.evadvantage.My.MyWebExtension
member.summary: Module used to define the properties that are available in the My Namespace for Web projects.

member.name: P:portal.evadvantage.My.MyWebExtension.Computer
member.summary: Returns information about the host computer.

member.name: P:portal.evadvantage.My.MyWebExtension.User
member.summary: Returns information for the current Web user.
